Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:17 - My usual topics
00:44 - How that message has morphed
01:12 - Freedom from surveillance - remoteID
01:56 - How this can go wrong
02:15 - You have to use this even on your property
02:33 - Congress asked the FAA to come up with a framework for tracking you
02:51 - It's being done for your safety
03:02 - The death count of consumer, quadcopter drones - ZERO
04:28 - Violation of 4th amendment rights
05:14 - Areas that don't require remoteID
05:30 - It stops criminals!!!!11one
06:41 - Criminals don't legally register drones
08:20 - Nuisance from karens
09:25 - Suit against the FAA
11:04 - 4th amendment case law
12:10 - FAA is not the enemy here - CONGRESS IS
12:22 - The FAA might've designed this to deliberately fail
13:25 - My concluding rant
13:53 - But Louis, I don't want to be spied on!
14:47 - But Louis I don't fly a drone why should I care?
15:35 - What has caused more deaths than quadcopters without surveillance legislation?
16:35 - Credits
